scripts.docker:restart: docker compose down && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.docker:db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.docker:backend:migrate: docker compose exec backend alembic upgrade head
scripts.docker:backend:seed: docker compose exec backend python -m seed.seed
scripts.docker:up:setup: pnpm run docker:up && pnpm run docker:backend:migrate && pnpm run docker:backend:seed
